author: A_Brickset_user
title: This Racer Rocks!
review:
I got 'im only earlier today, and I already know that I made the correct decision! Suprise why his number is only 9! This is fast, although, it needs space to build up speed:-( 
But, it is made up for with a sooooooo coooooooooool chassis! And that is without the colours! Yeah, you guessed it, those colours tell a long stoy made short - it's creators were Exo Force! Now, I haven't made the alternate models, but I do know that when I do, I'm gonna go "Woooooohooooooooo!"
